name: Plush Hospital - Teddy Bear and Pet Plushies Doctor Game for Kids
name_original: Plush Hospital - Teddy Bear and Pet Plushies Doctor Game for Kids
description:
Care for and heal the cutest plushies in town! Welcome to Plush Hospital, a place to take care of quite unusual -- and very fluffy -- patients, including the Teddy Bear, the Soft Kitty, the Goofy Puppy and the Sweet Bunny! Repair, clean, customize and play with toys in Plush Hospital. They’re already waiting for you!

REPAIR the stuffed animals with some extra cotton, sew their torn parts and glue them back together.
CLEAN, shower, dry and comb your cuddly toys to make them look and smell like brand new.
DRESS AND CUSTOMIZE your Teddy Bear, Kitty, Puppy or Bunny with incredible items.
NAME AND PACK your plushies in beautiful and colorful packages that you can customize as well.
SHARE your plush toys with your friends online.

HIGHLIGHTS
• Four different plush animals with endless customization options
• Fun and educational activities for toddlers and kids
• Dozens of exclusive items to decorate the toys
• Beautiful artwork and funny sound effects

Disclaimer: While this App is completely free to play, some additional content can be purchased for real money in-game. If you do not want to use this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Like our page on Facebook and be the first to know about our upcoming games and updates! http://fb.com/tappshq
